section.para: %LJ::HELPURLS is a hash that defines &url;s to supplemental documentation regarding a specific feature or widget in the &lj; interface. The following list describes the suggested content of each &url;.

listitem.simpara: Explains the different features and limits available to each capability class you define
Explains different login options like Bind Cookie to IP Address
Explains the different security settings available for posts
Explains how the Disable Auto-Formatting option works
Explains the differing amount of userpics available to each capability class
Explains what the IP Logging feature is, and what it is useful for
Explains why certain S2 settings might not be available to certain capability classes
Explains what Read-Only Mode on a journal is and why it happens
Explains how to choose a secure password
Explains what the SMS feature is and how it works
Explains why a userpic might become inactive, and how to make the userpic active again
Explains what the user-user text messaging feature is and how it works
Directs to site page to add a list of links to a journal, for use as a blogroll or reference point
